name: Nicholas Espinoza
text: Decent pizza quick cook so of course I tiny bit burnt but it was OK kinda tasted like pizza guys

name: Michael Griggs
text: Great pizza crust,  and quality toppings.  My only issue is when I asked for feta cheese, they barely put any on.  Almost didn't taste it.  But,  overall it was a decent pizza.  A little more feta and they would have had 5 stars.

name: Jack Wilson
text: Pesto garlic so good & it didn't even hurt lol

name: Vivian C.
text: Had my first Blaze Pizza, service was good, very modern atmosphere. The pizza itself was great tasting, but it was also burnt on the bottom which affected the taste for me... left in the oven maybe a second too long? Best way to describe this place it is like subway but with pizza.

name: Donna Keswick
text: Not what I expected at all. Very little topping for the pizza and the ceasar salad was ?. Not worth my time nor money.  Sorry guys.

name: Daniel Herrera
text: Have a new favorite. The hit link with spicy red sauce. Topped with sea salt and oregano. I like that we have the option to put whatever we want at the same price. Plus their alerts for my text messages about discounts of BOGO

name: Jonathan Nith
text: Earliest opening pizza shop that I've came across. Very nice people. Great toppings selection and beer on tap! Clean dining area, although the outdoor dining area could use some attention. Overall I've been here a handful of times in the span of 6 months and it's great! Get extra olives!

name: R Henderson
text: Very good pizza. Prices are fair for what you get. Restaurant is clean and well maintained. Staff is very kind every time we go in and friendly.

name: Hennessey Love
text: Great place. My son loves the ham.  Manager is super friendly and nice.  Always has a smile on her face.

name: Sparky Long
text: Fast thin cracker pizza

name: Tabitha Nunes
text: I love the simple pie pizzas and the lite refreshers. Skip the sub par soda machine. The staff lowers the rating. It's usually made up of our cellphone-in-the-back-pocket-youth which tend to carry themselves unprofessionally. Management ‚Ä¶More

name: claudia cruz
text: Pizza is very good. Takes just minutes to be ready. Many toppings to choose from and different crust or dough options. Would have given 5 stars, but had trouble redeeming rewards through the app.

name: RUNE GOOD
text: First timer.  Pizzas were delish.  Service was quick.  Cool spot.

name: Stephen Schultz
text: We came to this blaze pizza and was greeted with a wonderful smile and was taken care of quick and easy, Selina came out from the back and took over making our pizzas and made our experience  here a wonderful one thank you Selina keep up the great work we will be back because of you

name: Mila Love
text: Pretty cool set up with pizza oven insight so you can watch your pizza cook. Like the way you can choose your toppings and sauce. Crust was light and crispy. Nice selection of self serve drinks were tasty. They serve beer on tap. Blue moon nice n cold.

name: AntmanFelix
text: My wife absolutely loves Blaze. I think its alright. Not the best, not the worst. Cant wait to order Dante's this Sunday though. They have great pizza. MMMMMMMmmmmmmmmmmmmm piiiiiiiizzzzaaa

name: Louis White
text: Easy to walk in to order your pizza...fresh dough, fresh veggies. Friendly staff. Definitely will be returning soon.

name: Tom Coyan
text: Best individual pizzas!

text: Clean establishment and yummy food. They offered keto and regular pizza crust and it was easy to build my own pizza. This is a hidden little gem in Stockton and I will be recommending it to my fellow pizza lovers!
